Master Boom XB-1 flight planning in MSFS! âœˆï¸ Learn to modify SIDs, set approaches, and build full routes from scratch with navigation beacons.

ğŸ“‹ Description 
Struggling to manage navigation in the supersonic Boom XB-1? In this complete walkthrough, we take you from modifying existing routes to building complex flight plans from scratch. What we cover:

- Modifying Plans: How to swap departures (SIDs) and set up perfect approaches.
- Starting Fresh: Deleting the old plan and building a new one from the ground up.
- Advanced Nav: How to manually add navigation beacons for precision flying.

Whether you are new to the XB-1 or just need a refresher on the avionics, this guide has you covered. 

ğŸ‘‡ Drop a comment if you have questions about the nav system! Like and subscribe for more supersonic content.

- shift 7: look front right 
- shift 8: look right back
